You are a senior software architect and technical documentation expert.

Your task is to generate a complete, production-quality README.md file for this repository.

## Project Overview

This project is a modern full-stack flashcard learning web application that allows users to create decks, study cards with a flip animation, and store their data securely in the cloud.

## Features

- Create custom flashcard sets
- Study mode with flip cards
- Firebase authentication
- Firestore cloud database
- Mobile responsive design
- Minimalist UI

## Tech Stack

- Next.js 16 (App Router)
- React
- TypeScript
- Material UI
- Firebase Authentication
- Firestore Database

## Design System

Use a clean minimalist aesthetic and reference this color palette when describing UI or examples:

- #00030D
- #0C1526
- #58748C
- #4F6273
- #B8CAD9
